aboutPage.title:
Let me introduce
my self.
aboutPage.presentation: My name is Stefano Satta and I am a creative front-end developer
aboutPage.shortMessage:
I work in the field of software development for over 6 years.
I have partecipated in more than 15 projects with clients and companies of various sizes, both in the private sector and in public administration
aboutPage.shortMessageExperience: These experiences have allowed me to acquire and improve technical skills as well as soft skills.
aboutPage.checkBelowServices: Let's see below what we can do together

webDev.title: Web development
webDev.description: Creation of customized and responsive front-end projects, accessible using the best JavaScript technologies (Angular, React, Typescript)

ecommerce.title: eCommerce
ecommerce.description: I implement and develop high-performing and secure business solutions aimed at ensuring the best shopping experience to convert users into loyal customers.

webApplications.title: Web Applications
webApplications.description: I specialize in developing web applications optimized to meet the client's needs. The goal is to create business solutions to maximize efficiency, productivity, and digitization of every process.

privacyPage.title: Cookies
privacyPage.firstP: This internet website uses its own technical cookies  to help users to navigate the site as efficiently, easily and faster as possible.
privacyPage.secondP: Besides, it uses Google Analytics cookies to count visitor and more stats. For information about the cookies used to visit the appropriate <a href="https://www.google.com/policies/technologies/types/" target="_blank">page<a/> of Google.
privacyPage.thirdP: Analytical cookies are used to collect anonymous statistics information about the use of the site by users (e.g. number of visitors, links of provenance, key words used to find the site on search engines).
privacyPage.fourthP: For any information you can contact me at stefanosatta@outlook.com
